column4: hi all, i need to update my pidgin, what version should i download ? for windows, for source or ?
i dont know ? i just visited their site and there were different versions
can you compile stuff? if you can, use the source. Otherwise, you need to find a debian package. There is one in the intrepid repos, and getdeb.net has one.
it's a lot easier just to grab a .deb for it
not sure where you'll find a deb for 7.10 though
it's not hard to compile, if that fails
Linux mydesktop 2.6.27-7-generic #1 SMP Tue Oct 14 18:38:59 UTC 2008 x86_64 GNU/Linux
getdeb.net only has them for 8.04 I think
you can try it, though. Just download them all
